name: Dr. Birmohan Singh
bio: Expert in system analysis, with extensive experience in guiding IT projects. Passionate about mentoring students towards careers in IT project management and systems design.

name: Dr. Damanpreet Singh
bio: Specializes in machine learning algorithms and their real-world applications. Committed to helping students explore career paths in AI development and data science roles.

name: Dr. Major Singh Goraya
bio: Combines expertise in IoT and machine learning to design innovative solutions. Guides students towards careers in smart technologies and IoT-based system design.

name: Dr. Manoj Sachan
bio: Has extensive research experience in neural networks and deep learning. Dedicated to mentoring students aiming for careers in advanced AI research and development.

name: Dr. Gurjinder Kaur
bio: Focuses on cloud computing technologies and solutions for modern businesses. Supports students interested in careers within cloud infrastructure and IT consulting.

name: Dr. Amar Nath
bio: Researcher in the field of robotics, with practical experience in automation. Encourages students to explore careers in robotics engineering and industrial automation.

name: Dr. Jagdeep Singh
bio: AI specialist passionate about advancing artificial intelligence research. Mentors students towards opportunities in AI research and innovative startup ventures.

name: Dr. Manminder Singh
bio: Expert in digital image processing, focusing on image enhancement and restoration. Helps students prepare for careers in image analysis for healthcare and industry.

name: Dr. Preetpal Kaur Buttar
bio: Specializes in natural language processing and machine translation systems. Assists students in building careers in NLP for AI-driven communication technologies.

name: Dr. Tajinder Singh
bio: Researcher in deep learning architectures, with a focus on neural networks. Guides students towards roles in research labs and data-driven industries.

name: Dr. Utkarsh
bio: Specializes in theoretical aspects of computer systems and automata theory. Helps students navigate academic paths leading to careers in computational research.

name: Dr. VINOD KUMAR VERMA
bio: Expert in IoT solutions, focusing on smart devices and connected systems. Mentors students towards building careers in IoT product development and innovation.

name: Jaspal Singh
bio: Specializes in cloud computing infrastructure and virtualization technologies. Offers guidance to students seeking roles in cloud operations and IT consulting.

name: Rahul Gautam
bio: Focuses on image processing techniques for medical and industrial applications. Helps students prepare for careers in medical imaging and industrial automation.
